verses.verse: <S%G1510>Am<s%> I <S%G3756>not<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%>? <S%G1510>Am<s%> I <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1658>free<s%>? Have I <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G3708>seen<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>? <S%G2075>Are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>?

<S%G1487>If<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> an <S%G652>apostle<s%> unto <S%G243>others<s%>, <S%G235>yet<s%> <S%G1065>doubtless<s%> I <S%G1510>am<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G4973>seal<s%> of <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G651>apostleship<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
<S%G1699>My<s%> <S%G627>answer<s%> to <S%G3588>them<s%> that do <S%G350>examine<s%> <S%G1691>me<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%>,
Have <S%G2192%G99999>we<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G4095>drink<s%>?

Have <S%G2192%G99999>we<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to take <S%G4013>along<s%> a <S%G79>sister<s%>, a <S%G1135>wife<s%>, <S%G5613>like<s%> <S%G2532>the<s%> <S%G3062>other<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> as the <S%G80>brothers<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2786>Cephas<s%>?
<S%G2228>Or<s%> do <S%G1473%G99999>I<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>Barnabas<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1849>right<s%> to not <S%G2038>work<s%>?

<S%G5101>Who<s%> goes to <S%G4754>war<s%> any <S%G4218>time<s%> at his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3800>expense<s%>? <S%G5101>Who<s%> <S%G5452>plants<s%> a <S%G290>vineyard<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2068>eats<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> its <S%G2590>fruit<s%>? <S%G846><s%> <S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G5101>who<s%> <S%G4165>feeds<s%> a <S%G4167>flock<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2068>drinks<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1051>milk<s%> of the <S%G4167>flock<s%>?

Do <S%G2980>I<s%> say these <S%G5023%G99999>things<s%> <S%G2596>as<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%>? <S%G2228>Or<s%> <S%G3780>doesn<s%>'t the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> the <S%G5023>same<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>?

<S%G1063>For<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%>, You <S%G5392>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3592>muzzle<s%> the mouth of the <S%G1016>ox<s%> that treads out the <S%G248>corn<s%>. <S%G3361><s%> <S%G3199>Does<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> take <S%G3199>care<s%> for <S%G1016>oxen<s%>?

<S%G2228>Or<s%> does <S%G3004>he<s%> say it <S%G3843>altogether<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> our <S%G2248>sakes<s%>? <S%G1223>For<s%> our <S%G2248>sakes<s%>, no <S%G1063>doubt<s%>, this is <S%G1125>written<s%>: <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> that <S%G722>plows<s%> <S%G3784>should<s%> <S%G722>plow<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%>; and <S%G2532>that<s%> he <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G248>threshes<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> should be <S%G3348>partaker<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%>.

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> have <S%G4687>sown<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> spiritual <S%G4152>things<s%>, is it a great <S%G3173>thing<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> shall <S%G2325>reap<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> fleshly <S%G4559>things<s%>?

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> are <S%G3348>partakers<s%> of this <S%G1849>right<s%> from <S%G5216>you<s%>, should <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G3123>also<s%>? <S%G235>Nevertheless<s%> we <S%G5530>have<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5530>used<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1849>right<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G4722>suffer<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>, <S%G3363>lest<s%> we <S%G1325%G99999>should<s%> <S%G1464>hinder<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

Do <S%G1492>you<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>they<s%> which <S%G2038>minister<s%> around holy <S%G2413>things<s%> <S%G2068>eat<s%> of the things <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>? And they which <S%G4332>wait<s%> at the <S%G2379>altar<s%> are <S%G4829>partakers<s%> with the <S%G2379>altar<s%>?

<S%G2532>Even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1299>has<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> ordained <S%G1299>that<s%> they <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2605>preach<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> should <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> have <S%G5530>used<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%> of these <S%G5130>things<s%>: <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756>neither<s%> have I <S%G1125>written<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> it should <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G1096>done<s%> <S%G1722>unto<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G3123>better<s%> for <S%G3427>me<s%> to <S%G599>die<s%>, <S%G2570><s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> should <S%G2758>make<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G2745>glorying<s%> <S%G2758>void<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1437>though<s%> I preach the <S%G2097>gospel<s%>, <S%G3427>I<s%> <S%G2076>have<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> to glory <S%G2745>of<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G318>necessity<s%> is <S%G1945>laid<s%> upon <S%G3427>me<s%>; <S%G1161>Yes<s%>, <S%G3759>woe<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> it to <S%G3427>me<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G2097>preach<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%>!

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> I <S%G4238>do<s%> this <S%G5124>thing<s%> <S%G1635>willingly<s%>, I <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G3408>reward<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> against my <S%G210>will<s%>, a <S%G3622>stewardship<s%> of the gospel is committed unto <S%G4100>me<s%>.

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3427>my<s%> <S%G3408>reward<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? Truly <S%G2443>that<s%>, when I preach the <S%G2097>gospel<s%>, I may <S%G5087>make<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> without <S%G1519>charge<s%>, that I <S%G2710>abuse<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> though I <S%G5607>am<s%> <S%G1658>free<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1402>men<s%>, yet have I made <S%G1683>myself<s%> <S%G1402>servant<s%> unto <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G2770>gain<s%> the <S%G4119>more<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> unto the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> I <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G2770>gain<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>; to them that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G2770>gain<s%> them that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>;

To them that are without <S%G459>law<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> without <S%G459>law<s%>, <S%G5607>(being<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> without <S%G459>law<s%> to <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> under the <S%G1772>law<s%> to <S%G5547>Christ<s%>,) <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G2770>gain<s%> them that are without <S%G459>law<s%>.

To the <S%G772>weak<s%> became <S%G1096>I<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G772>weak<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G2770>gain<s%> the <S%G772>weak<s%>: I am <S%G1096>made<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2443>men<s%>, that I <S%G4982>might<s%> by all <S%G3843>means<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> I <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>'s sake, <S%G2443>that<s%> I might <S%G1096>be<s%> <S%G4791>partaker<s%> there with <S%G846>you<s%>.

Know <S%G1492>you<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5143>run<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G4712>race<s%> <S%G5143>run<s%> <S%G3303>all<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2983>receives<s%> the <S%G1017>prize<s%>? <S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G5143>run<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> you may <S%G2638>obtain<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> every <S%G3956>man<s%> that strives to <S%G75>compete<s%> is <S%G1467>temperate<s%> in all <S%G3956>things<s%>. <S%G3767>Now<s%> <S%G1565%G99999>they<s%> do it <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G2983>obtain<s%> a <S%G5349>corruptible<s%> <S%G4735>crown<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> an <S%G862>incorruptible<s%>.

<S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G5106>therefore<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5143>run<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G84>uncertainly<s%>; <S%G3779>so<s%> fight <S%G4438>I<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> one that <S%G1194>beats<s%> the <S%G109>air<s%>:

<S%G235>But<s%> I <S%G5299>subdue<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> bring it into <S%G1396>subjection<s%>: lest that by any <S%G3381>means<s%>, <S%G4458><s%> when I have <S%G2784>preached<s%> to <S%G243>others<s%>, I <S%G846>myself<s%> should <S%G1096>be<s%> a <S%G96>castaway<s%>.
